accountExists.title: ACCOUNT ALREADY EXISTS
accountExists.description: Login to your account to access your lists and related features.

accountAbsent.title: CREATE OR LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT
accountAbsent.description: Create or login to access your lists and related features.

accountInvalid.title: ACCOUNT DOES NOT EXIST
accountInvalid.description: Create your account to access your lists and related features.

accountCreationFailure.title: FAILED TO CREATE YOUR ACCOUNT
accountCreationFailure.description: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again in a little while.

loginPasswordIncorrect.title: FAILED TO LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT
loginPasswordIncorrect.description: The password you entered, to this account, is incorrect.

loginPasswordMismatch.title: FAILED TO LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT
loginPasswordMismatch.description: The password you entered does not match.
